original_title: Kay Dali ng Kahapon, Kay Tagal ng Bukas
overview: Two young lovers navigate through their lives as a young, married couple in midst of their personal family issues and affairs.
tagline: Fate can play such cruel games to our hearts, and we wait so long for the right time, the right moment to love...
title: Kay Dali ng Kahapon, Kay Tagal ng Bukas
